Class ClusterViewByClientImpl<K extends EntryKey>

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ClusterViewByClientImpl<K extends EntryKey>
extends ClusterViewByClient<K>
    Class that encapsulates view of the cluster, as whole, from client perspective.

      • isFullyAvailable

        public boolean isFullyAvailable()
        Description copied from class: ClusterViewByClient
        Method that can be called to determine whether at least one node exists to access all keys of cluster's key space. Currently this accepts both active and passive ranges, as well as disabled nodes; mostly because method is called during bootstrapping when we are typically interested in possibility of everything being accessible.
        Specified by:
        isFullyAvailable in class ClusterViewByClient<K extends EntryKey>
